item.title: Goldman, Morgan Stanley ratings lowered due to lofty stock values
item.description: With stock prices of Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Morgan Stanley both outperforming the S&P 500 handily on optimism in the banking sector, HSBC analys...

item.title: Rivian to use Biden administration loan to boost competitiveness of its EVs
item.description: Rivian said it will use a $6.6 billion government loan to “aggressively” scale manufacturing of its R2, which is coming in 2026.

item.title: I’m inheriting $600,000. Should I fire my parents’ longtime adviser? And what should I do instead?
item.description: You need to find the right financial adviser for you, regardless of previous relationships

item.title: Warren Buffett’s 5 estate-planning tips are just as valuable as his investing advice
item.description: If you think he’s smart about money, wait until you hear what he has to say about wills

item.title: ‘His divorce lawyer was completely useless’: My husband is on the mortgage of his ex-wife’s house. She’s behind on the loan. What can we do?
item.description: ‘If he contacts the bank and asks to remove his name from the mortgage because he has no legal responsibility, will they force her to refinance?’
